data.name: mallob
data.description: Malleable Load Balancer. Massively Parallel Logic Backend. Award-winning SAT solving for the cloud.

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

evidence: “Mallob is a distributed platform for automated reasoning in modern large-scale HPC and cloud environments. Mallob primarily solves instances of propositional satisfiability (SAT)”
“For a default quick-start build, execute scripts/setup/build.sh… Run build/mallob --help for an overview of all Mallob options.”
“E.g., to run MallobSat with a single (MPI) process… execute build/mallob -mono=path/to/problem.cnf … For multi-process and distributed execution, prepend the command by mpirun or mpiexec…”
